name: filter_na12878vcf_with_bedfile
title: Filter the NA12878 vcf file using BED file
summary: Creates a vcf file containing a subset of the NA12878 variants that fall within the regions in a given BED file.

inputSpec.name: NA12878_vcf
inputSpec.label: NA12878_vcf
inputSpec.help: The NA12878 vcf file to be filtered

inputSpec.name: bedfile
inputSpec.label: bedfile to filter NA12878 vcf
inputSpec.help: The bedfile you wish to use to filter the NA12878 vcf file with

outputSpec.name: filtered_vcf
outputSpec.label: filtered_vcf
outputSpec.help: A vcf file containing variants from NA12878 that fall within the regions given in the bed file.
